title: Bare Land for Sale in Nugegoda
details:
- Land Extent: 36 Perches

- Property is located on Pangiriwatta Road which is off Old Kesbewa Road.

- The land has significant road frontage facing Pangiriwatta Road.

- Pangiriwatta Road is approx. 15-20 feet wide.

- The property is also adjoining an approx. 15-20 foot lane off Pangiriwatta Road. i.e. The property has access from two roads and road frontage on two sides along the property.

- Clear title.
